data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 5 - Allegiance Pack
data.detailed_description:
Suzuki, Yamaha, KTM, Kawasaki, Honda, GasGas and Husqvarna: choose the theme of your favorite motorcycle manufacturer and customize your profile, menu and game elements! Buy the Allegiance Pack now!

Includes:
  • Main menu wallpapers
  • Player profile icons
  • Badges dedicated to each manufacturer in the rankings
data.about_the_game:
Suzuki, Yamaha, KTM, Kawasaki, Honda, GasGas and Husqvarna: choose the theme of your favorite motorcycle manufacturer and customize your profile, menu and game elements! Buy the Allegiance Pack now!

Includes:
  • Main menu wallpapers
  • Player profile icons
  • Badges dedicated to each manufacturer in the rankings
data.short_description: Buy the Allegiance Pack and show what kind of rider you are by customizing your game experience with additions from the various motorcycle manufacturers.

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) or Vega 11 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 VRAM) or Radeon R9 390X (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
